title: On a Sunday he went fishing
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Life change events

abstract: 'He loved to fish, ever since he was little and used to go with his father. He had just bought his new boat, a lifelong dream.'
description: Sarah Mifsud's father was an avid fisherman as was his father before him. Mifsud tells of the ordinary Sunday which turned tragically extraordinary for her family and the journey to rebuild in the aftermath.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002321; Western stories : expressions for the future; Active; 2010
